item.title: BO - Modules : ps_imageslider - Configure
item.description: BO - Modules : ps_imageslider - Configure Details Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-6763 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO> Modules> Module Manager> “image” in search bar Module manager page displayed Click on configure button the configure image slider page is well displayed Go to Settings -> update Pause on hover to NO and save The settings have been successfully updated. message is displayed Go to Settings -> update Pause on hover to Yes
